title: CARTMAN 39 Piece Tool Set General Household Hand Kit with Plastic Toolbox Storage Case Orange
descriptions:
Meet the CARTMAN 39-Piece Home Tool Set — a simple, handy kit for everyday fixes.

What it is:
- A small toolbox with 39 basic tools you’ll actually use.
- Bright orange case that’s easy to spot.

What’s inside:
- Hammer
- Pliers
- Several screwdrivers
- Tape measure
- Plus other small tools for common household jobs

Easy to use:
- Tools are strong and long-lasting (heat treated and chrome plated).
- Rust-resistant, so they stay nice over time.
- Each tool has its own spot in the case, so it’s easy to put back and find again.

Easy to carry:
- Lightweight.
- Comfortable carrying handle.
- Plastic storage case keeps everything together and tidy.

Good for:
- Small home repairs like tightening screws, hanging pictures, and measuring spaces.
- Simple DIY projects.
- A thoughtful gift for a new homeowner, a senior living independently, or anyone who wants a reliable set on hand.

Why you’ll like it:
- No fuss, no clutter — just the essentials.
- Clear, organized case helps you see what you need at a glance.
- Durable tools that won’t easily wear out.

Choose the CARTMAN 39-Piece Tool Set to make little fixes quick and stress-free, right when you need them.
